alert.note: Alert for Logan; Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:01PM MDT until July 21 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... West central Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 600 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Keota, or 28 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Raymer and Stoneham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
